EmailTemplate.subject: Danfoss Power Solutions H1 Base Model Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Please see attached document containing information regarding
the New H1 Base Model Program effective January 2014
For more information, please contact your Sauer-Danfoss Account Manager.
Best regards,
